Text.Page:
You know {@LinkCreature:249#1013}, right?

He went to study the {@Rgn:50008}. Alone."Is that dangerous?"

Yes. The zariik spodas near the {@Rgn:50008} could tear him to pieces. He's not a soldier.

If you can keep him alive, I'll owe you.

How amusing! I was just wondering how I'd get out of here alive, and then you suddenly show up!

You possess a remarkable facility for fortuitous intervention.
